intro: Persoonia pertinax, commonly known as the narrow-leaf geebung, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its narrow, leathery leaves and distinctive yellow or orange flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and is often found in heathlands and coastal areas. Persoonia pertinax is well adapted to the dry, nutrient-poor conditions of its native habitat. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for garden cultivation in suitable climates.
